Key:
What... are you doing here? I guess you could ask
me the same thing, huh?

It was something we do not usually experience. I'm
embarrassed.
You don't look embarrassed at all.

You see, I want to do it again. How did you like
me in a maid outfit?

Well, you were adorable, of course... I mean,
that's not it! A-Anyways, let's forget that
happened, yeah?

Aw, how unfortunate. Shido-san, you were so into
me.
